page.title: 13GOLDEN MOOR FARM
page.content: {Golden Moor}is farmed by{Mr.J.W.Robson whose brother farms{Quarry House.}He has been there for 21 years during which time he has improved the drainage and done a lot of re-fencing. Like his brother he specialises in arable farming. He grows winter wheat, barley,oats,peas,oil seed rape, turnips and potatoes.He has 230 sheep which graze the rough grassland, 14 cattle and{15 horses.}He employs a man for the farm and a{girl groom.}She gets up at about 6a.m. to feed and water the horses. Then she takes them out for exercise during the summer{but {in the winter the horses are stabled {in a warmer part of the country}and then she helps with the general farmwork especially the lambing.Mr. Robson has now assumed a more managerial role on the farm but he still helps care for the horses.
